survey_name: Post-Pandemic Office Space Redesign Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the redesign of office spaces to accommodate post-pandemic work preferences and hybrid work models. The insights will help optimize workspace layouts, amenities, and technology integrations.
